summary: Project to implement UI and functionality fixes: add Logout in menu, restore multi-device data sync behavior (as in Draft 30), fix responsive date-range alignment on small screens, ensure key menu items are visible as tabs on laptop, and enable PDF/Excel export features without 'Not available' state.
architectural_notes: Maintain feature parity with prior Draft 30 behavior; do not remove existing features without explicit user approval.
known_issues: Multi-device data sync stopped working (previously worked in Draft 30 within 2–5 seconds).
Export PDF/Excel shows 'Not available' and controls are disabled.
Payment History/Expense History/Export Report not visible in laptop browser navigation (hidden in hamburger).
Date range UI alignment breaks on small screens due to hamburger button.

existing_features.title: Add a Logout action inside the in-app hamburger/menu (mobile sidebar) so users can log out from the menu, in addition to any existing logout access.

Fix and restore multi-device data synchronization so that while logged in with the same account on multiple devices, changes made on one device are reflected on the other within ~2–5 seconds (matching Draft 30 behavior) across all ledger/user inputs.
Make the Date Range UI responsive on small screens and fix alignment issues introduced by the hamburger/menu button so the date range controls remain usable and well-aligned on narrow widths.

On laptop/large screens, ensure Payment History, Expense History, and Export Report are visible as desktop navigation items (not hidden behind the hamburger menu), while keeping them in the hamburger menu for small screens.
Enable Export PDF and Export Excel so they are not shown as "Not available" and are functional when selected, with clear user feedback on completion/failure.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Logout button inside the app menu (hamburger/menu)
Fix/restore multi-device data sync while logged in with same account to match Draft 30 behavior (updates within ~2–5 seconds)
Make Date Range UI responsive on small screens; fix alignment issues caused by hamburger button
On laptop/large screens, show Payment History, Expense History, and Export Report as visible tabs (not hidden in hamburger); keep hamburger-only on small screens
Enable Export PDF & Excel (currently disabled showing 'Not available'); make export functional

projectName: Restore multi-device data sync, improve responsive navigation, and enable PDF/Excel export
